name: echochrome ii
description:
echochrome™ ii introduces a new take on the puzzle genre with a unique game play twist that lets players use their imagination to solve puzzles by controlling light and shadows. Use the PlayStation®Eye camera and PlayStation®Move motion controller to rotate levels, control light, and change the way objects are viewed and shadows are cast.
This full game features all new puzzles and 100 Levels with the ability to move perspectives, angles and light in your own way to reveal shadow art and puzzle solutions!
With the YouTube Uploader you can capture yourself playing a level and upload the replay data directly on YouTube.com.
You can even create your own level and share it with the world who can play and rate your mind-bending creations.
Download the full game today!
(PlayStation®Move and PlayStation®Eye Required.)
HD 1080p requires an HDMI cable and a 1080p native display with an HDMI input supporting HDCP. Video out in HD requires cables and an HD compatible display, both sold separately. This video will play displays ranging from standard definition to 1080p.
